name: Box Climer
description:
Climb Boxes to higher and higher floors!

Controls

A,D - to move

Space - to jump

S - to dash

Tips

You have a double jump, use it!

Dashing changes you're hitbox

Press space cancels you're dash

You can wall jump

Update 2.0

fix boxes spawnkilling

added start screen/tutorial

added new kinds of boxes

added music

changed some visuals

Art pack used:

Pixel Adventure 

 https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

And that's pretty much it , have fun!

(also this is my first game posted to itch, so don't expect much)
